response.overview: Jefferson Starship's album, "Red Octopus," originally released in 1975, stands as a seminal work in the evolution of rock music. Featuring the soaring vocals of Grace Slick and the melodic craftsmanship of Marty Balin. This album captures the band's signature blend of rock, progressive, and psychedelic elements.  The album includes iconic tracks like "Miracles," which showcases the band's softer, more romantic side, and other fan favorites such as "Play On Love" and "Fast Buck Freddie." This Blu-ray Quadio edition is a must-have for audiophiles and fans of Jefferson Starship, providing a fresh, enriched way to experience this classic album.  Now available With 192/24 Resolution Quadraphonic And Hi-Res Stereo Mixes, "Red Octopus" offers an enhanced auditory experience that brings the album's dynamic sound to life with unprecedented clarity.
response.title: Red Octopus - Quadio
